name: SB Scroll To Top
author: Shathi Begum

sections.description: This is simple scroll to top plugin. Anyone can easily install and use it. Also can change button color and hover color. This plugin will show button in all pages of your site.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Appearance->Customize->SB Scroll to Top screen to configure the plugin
    Here you can change button background color and hover color. Remember to save your changes.

short_description: Here is a short description of the plugin.  This should be no more than 150 characters.  No markup here.
